nodes.text: Remembrance Hall was a museum in Forard, on Almas.

Remembrance Hall was used by the Jedi of the Almas Academy as a museum to display various artifacts, including a holoplacard of Ood Bnar fighting during the Battle of Ossus. Padawans from the Academy, such as Tinya, would serve as tour guides in the museum. However, after it was attacked by terrorists, the holoplacard of Ood Bnar was destroyed.
Following the end of the Clone Wars, Almas was abandoned and Remembrance Hall was covered in graffiti, that said DEATH TO THE UNFAITHFUL. This was probably written by members of the Believers.
